name: tabstone
description: Organize and declutter browser tabs with a graveyard theme

scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.dev:chrome: npm run build:chrome && echo 'Load dist/chrome as unpacked extension in Chrome'
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run build:firefox && echo 'Load dist/firefox as temporary add-on in Firefox'
scripts.test:chrome: npm run build:chrome && echo 'Test dist/chrome in Chrome'
scripts.test:firefox: npm run build:firefox && echo 'Test dist/firefox in Firefox'
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && echo 'Manually zip dist/chrome/ for Chrome Web Store'
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && echo 'Manually zip dist/firefox/ for Firefox Add-ons'
scripts.package:all: npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox
scripts.release: npm run version:bump:patch && npm run build:all && npm run package:all
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:bump:minor && npm run build:all && npm run package:all
scripts.release:major: npm run version:bump:major && npm run build:all && npm run package:all
